typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ContainerName as string ('raw'),
	FolderName as string ('CosmosDB_SingleFile')
}
source(output(
		SourceSystem as string,
		c1_flag as boolean,
		c1_school_closing as short,
		c2_flag as boolean,
		c2_workplace_closing as short,
		c3_cancel_public_events as short,
		c3_flag as boolean,
		c4_flag as boolean,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings as short,
		c5_close_public_transport as short,
		c5_flag as boolean,
		c6_flag as boolean,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements as short,
		c7_flag as boolean,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement as short,
		c8_international_travel_controls as short,
		confirmedcases as short,
		confirmeddeaths as short,
		countrycode as string,
		countryname as string,
		date as string,
		e1_flag as boolean,
		e1_income_support as short,
		{e2_debt/contract_relief} as short,
		e3_fiscal_measures as integer,
		e4_international_support as double,
		h1_flag as boolean,
		h1_public_information_campaigns as short,
		h2_testing_policy as short,
		h3_contact_tracing as short,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare as integer,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines as boolean,
		iso_country as string,
		load_date as string,
		stringencyindex as double,
		stringencyindexfordisplay as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[($FolderName)]) ~> ADLSCosmosDB
ADLSCosmosDB sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AzureSynapse
